verses.text: Hear \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; let \w my|strong="H3068"\w* cry \w for|strong="H3588"\w* help come \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

Hide \w not|strong="H8085"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* face \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H8085"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* day \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* distress. Incline \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w ear|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H8085"\w*: \w when|strong="H8085"\w* \w I|strong="H8085"\w* \w call|strong="H8085"\w*, answer \w me|strong="H8085"\w* speedily.

\w For|strong="H7121"\w* \w my|strong="H5641"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* pass \w away|strong="H5186"\w* \w like|strong="H3117"\w* smoke: \w my|strong="H5641"\w* bones \w are|strong="H3117"\w* burned \w through|strong="H4480"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w with|strong="H6440"\w* fire.

\w My|strong="H3615"\w* heart \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w scorched|strong="H2787"\w*, withered \w like|strong="H3615"\w* grass; \w I|strong="H3588"\w* forget \w to|strong="H3117"\w* eat \w my|strong="H3615"\w* bread.
\w By|strong="H3588"\w* reason \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* loud groaning, \w my|strong="H3588"\w* flesh clings \w to|strong="H3820"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* bones.
Like \w a|strong="H3068"\w* desert-owl \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H6963"\w* wilderness, like \w an|strong="H6963"\w* owl among ruins am \w I|strong="H6963"\w*.

\w I|strong="H1961"\w* \w make|strong="H1819"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* sleepless lament \w like|strong="H1819"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* bird \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* house-top alone.
\w All|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* day wild foes revile \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, using \w my|strong="H5921"\w* name \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* curse.

\w For|strong="H3117"\w* ashes \w have|strong="H3117"\w* \w been|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* bread, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* tears \w have|strong="H3117"\w* \w been|strong="H3605"\w* mixed \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* cup.

\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H3899"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* passionate anger, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* did raise \w me|strong="H3588"\w*, \w then|strong="H3588"\w* hurl \w me|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H3899"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* ground.
\w My|strong="H5375"\w* days come \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w an|strong="H5375"\w* end, shadows lengthen, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* wither \w like|strong="H6440"\w* grass.

\w But|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \nd Lord\nd*, \w are|strong="H3117"\w* enthroned \w forever|strong="H3117"\w*, \w your|strong="H5186"\w* fame endures \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w all|strong="H3117"\w* generations.

\w You|strong="H5769"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* arise \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* pity \w on|strong="H3427"\w* Zion; \w it|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w time|strong="H5769"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* gracious; her hour \w has|strong="H3068"\w* come.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w her|strong="H6965"\w* stones \w are|strong="H6726"\w* dear \w to|strong="H6256"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* servants, \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* dust \w of|strong="H6256"\w* \w her|strong="H6965"\w* ruins \w they|strong="H3588"\w* look \w on|strong="H7355"\w* \w with|strong="H6726"\w* \w love|strong="H7355"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* nations \w will|strong="H5650"\w* revere \w the|strong="H3588"\w* name \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w and|strong="H5650"\w* all \w the|strong="H3588"\w* kings \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w earth|strong="H6083"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* glory,

\w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* built \w up|strong="H4428"\w* Zion, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* revealed \w himself|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*,

\w in|strong="H3068"\w* response \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* prayer \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* destitute, whose prayer \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* despise.

\w Let|strong="H3808"\w* \w this|strong="H6437"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* recorded \w for|strong="H8605"\w* ages \w to|strong="H6437"\w* come, \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w may|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* praised \w by|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w* \w yet|strong="H3808"\w* unborn.

\w For|strong="H5971"\w* \w he|strong="H5971"\w* \w shall|strong="H5971"\w* look \w down|strong="H3789"\w* \w from|strong="H5971"\w* \w his|strong="H1984"\w* holy height, \w from|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H1984"\w* heavens \w the|strong="H1984"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3050"\+w*\nd* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* gaze \w on|strong="H3789"\w* \w the|strong="H1984"\w* earth,

\w to|strong="H3068"\w* hear \w the|strong="H3588"\w* groans \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* prisoner, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* free \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H8064"\w* doomed \w to|strong="H3068"\w* die;

\w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w people|strong="H1121"\w* \w may|strong="H1121"\w* recount \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \nd Lord\nd*’s fame \w in|strong="H8085"\w* Zion, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* praise \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w him|strong="H8085"\w* \w in|strong="H8085"\w* Jerusalem,

\w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* nations \w are|strong="H3068"\w* gathered together, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* kingdoms, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* worship \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* broken \w my|strong="H3068"\w* strength \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5647"\w* way, \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* shortened \w my|strong="H3068"\w* days.

\w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* say, ‘\w My|strong="H6031"\w* God, take \w me|strong="H3117"\w* \w not|strong="H1870"\w* hence \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* midst \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H6031"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*. ‘\w Your|strong="H6031"\w* \w years|strong="H3117"\w* endure \w age|strong="H3117"\w* \w after|strong="H3117"\w* \w age|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w Of|strong="H3117"\w* \w old|strong="H8141"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3117"\w* founded \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w earth|strong="H5927"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* heavens \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* work \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H5927"\w* hands.

\w They|strong="H6440"\w* \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* perish; but \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w do|strong="H4639"\w* stand. \w They|strong="H6440"\w* \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* \w all|strong="H6440"\w* \w wax|strong="H3027"\w* \w old|strong="H6440"\w* \w like|strong="H8064"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* garment, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* change \w as|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* robe \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H8064"\w* change \w them|strong="H6440"\w*.
\w But|strong="H1992"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w same|strong="H1992"\w*, \w your|strong="H3605"\w* years \w are|strong="H1992"\w* endless.

\w The|strong="H3808"\w* children \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* servants abide, evermore \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* seed \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w before|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*.’
